name: fusc
description: Obfuscate text inside HTML elements with other characters

scripts.build-js: browserify index.js -s scratch -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] > dist/index.js
scripts.example: cd examples; budo -p 8080 -o index.js -- -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ]
scripts.test: browserify tests/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] | tape-run | tap-colorize --info black

author: htor
